Plot: A Walk in the Clouds depicted a story about a young-married US military soldier, named Paul, who returned home after the World War II. In the middle of the way back home, he accidentally ...
Title: A Walk in the Clouds
Writer: Robert Mark Kamen (screenplay), Mark Miller (screenplay), Harvey Weitzman (screenplay), Piero Tellini (story and screenplay material: "Quattro passi fra le nuvole"), Cesare Zavattini (story and screenplay material: "Quattro passi fra le nuvole"), Vittorio de Benedetti (story and screenplay material: "Quattro passi fra le nuvole")
Actors: Keanu Reeves, Aitana Sánchez-Gijón, Anthony Quinn, Giancarlo Giannini
